TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecondPieSize extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

Docs.summary: Second Pie Size. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is c:secondPieSize.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **secondPieSize (Second Pie Size)** This element specifies the size of the second pie or bar of a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart, as a percentage of the size of the first pie. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |ofPieChart (§21.2.2.126)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Second Pie Size Value)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain an integer between 5 and 200.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_SecondPieSize* simple type (§21.2.3.41).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_SecondPieSize) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Val : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.UInt16Value with get, set

Docs.summary: Second Pie Size Value.Represents the following attribute in the schema: val

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the contents of this attribute will contain an integer between 5 and 200.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the `ST_SecondPieSize` simple type.
